page.title: 04KENTS OAK MUSHROOM FARM
page.content: The number of mushrooms picked each day varies from 1000_4000 boxes. Each box contains between two and three pounds. Open mushrooms cost Â£2.40 for three pounds. Cup mushrooms cost Â£3.00. Most of the mushrooms are sold at Southampton market. Some people buy mushrooms from the farm itself. There are 18 pickers who are on piece work, 3 packers paid by the hour and 6 outside workers who clear the trays of spent compost, clean the trays and plant the spawn. There are 15 picking sheds. After planting the spawn the trays are kept in heated sheds. It takes about six weeks before the trays are ready for picking and each tray can be picked for about six weeks. Mushrooms are grown all the year round at this farm in{Awbridge.
